item.title: The Sqoop tool imports data into the Hive note
item.description: Recently, the construction of a data warehouse is being messed up, just some of the dimension table data needs to come from RDBMS data, in the HADOOP environment is the most popular than Apache’s Sqoop tool, according to the official documentation operation is also smooth, but when to apply to the business scenario when the problem arises.
